news.description: Consisting of Microsoft, Apple, Nvidia, Amazon, Alphabet, Meta Platforms, and Tesla, the "Magnificent Seven" may be the most important stocks of this generation. After collectively rising 107% in 2023 -- and another 14% so far in 2024 -- each of these busines…

news.author: Kate Irwin
news.title: Elon Musk: Tesla's SpaceX Roadster Finally Launches Next Year
news.description:
Musk claims the next Tesla Roadster is a 'SpaceX collab' able to hit 60 mph in less than one second.
Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk has taken to X, the social media platform he owns, to share a few updates on the status of the second-generation Tesla Roadster…

news.author: Steve Goldstein
news.title: It turns out, the U.S. is one of the least concentrated stock markets in the world
news.description: For all the talk about the Magnificent Seven and the ultra-reliance of just a handful of companies to drive stock-market returns, it turns out the U.S. is in fact one of the least concentrated markets in the world.
